name: Leland E. ROTHERMEL, Jr., Personal Representative of Leland E. Rothermel and Dorothy Rothermel, in her right v. OWENS-ILLINOIS GLASS CO., Johns-Manville Corporation and Keene Corporation. Appeal of OWENS-ILLINOIS GLASS CO.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. No. 701(f).
parties: Leland E. ROTHERMEL, Jr., Personal Representative of Leland E. Rothermel and Dorothy Rothermel, in her right v. OWENS-ILLINOIS GLASS CO., Johns-Manville Corporation and Keene Corporation. Appeal of OWENS-ILLINOIS GLASS CO.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. No. 701(f).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Nathan A. Schachtman, Carol L. Widemon, Cherry Hill, NJ, for Owens-Illinois Glass Company.
Edward P. Monaghan, Jeffrey G. Moyer, Philadelphia, for Leland E. Rothermel, Jr., et al.
R. Bruce Morrison, Philadelphia, for Johns-Manville Corporation.
James Lotz, New York City, for Keene Corporation.
casebody.head_matter:
667 A.2d 212
Leland E. ROTHERMEL, Jr., Personal Representative of Leland E. Rothermel and Dorothy Rothermel, in her right v. OWENS-ILLINOIS GLASS CO., Johns-Manville Corporation and Keene Corporation. Appeal of OWENS-ILLINOIS GLASS CO.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1995.
Decided Nov. 22, 1995.
Nathan A. Schachtman, Carol L. Widemon, Cherry Hill, NJ, for Owens-Illinois Glass Company.
Edward P. Monaghan, Jeffrey G. Moyer, Philadelphia, for Leland E. Rothermel, Jr., et al.
R. Bruce Morrison, Philadelphia, for Johns-Manville Corporation.
James Lotz, New York City, for Keene Corporation.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
